name: Shmonkey
description:
Shmonkey and her companion Tentico love fruit jam so much.

Use Arrow keys to move Shmonkey.
Use X and C keys for cross-swapping of the fruit.
Esc - quit the game.
Keep your hands full, at least one or you might fell in the water and die.
The top row has green leaves, so it is safe. You cannot fell off from there.

Sometimes Tentico tries to help you gathering fruit. Do not accept any help from him! Your JAM is made with LOVE and it is way better than Tentico's.
So avoid his sticky tentacles or you might fell in water and have some chit-chat with an angry Mr.Tentacles.

Remember, both of you hate black plums. Do not even try to swap the plums. It is useless.

PS I've started the project this morning and had ~12 hours for all.
All the font/music/sfx authors are in the licensy folder. You should unzip either Shmonkey.exe or Shmonkey.love to reach the folder.
